answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found samples of Outstanding Citizen Award programs. The links below include information about each area's application and nomination process. You can contact these jurisdictions individually for more information. 
Muskegon, Michigan:
ttp://www.muskegon-mi.gov/outstanding-citizenship-award-application/
Columbia, Missouri:
http://www.columbiamochamber.com/pdf_files/Insert-2011%20Outstanding%20Citizen%20Award%20Applicationv2.pdf
Somerset County, New Jersey:
http://www.scbp.org/media/awards/outstanding-citizen-of-the-year-award
Schaumburg, Illinois:
http://www.ci.schaumburg.il.us/loc/Locate2/Pages/OutstandingCitizenAwardNomination.aspx
Bentonville, Arkansas:
http://www.bentonvillear.com/docs/admin/outstanding_citizen_program.pdf
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Nancy Deno
text:
Hi
Do you have any samples of successful Outstanding Citizen Award programs?  We will be creating the program and thought there may be some good ones out there showing the application and process.
If so, can I get a couple examples?
thanks for your assistance.
Nancy
title: Outstanding Citizen award program
